description:
Build autofill_browser and autofill_renderer as standalone libs.

BUG=140037

TBR=ben@chromium.org, joi@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=191584

messages.text:
ben: chrome/chrome_browser.gypi and chrome/chrome_renderer.gypi

joi: components/ OWNER

isherman: autofill.gypi

LGTM with the below fixed:

https://codereview.chromium.org/12984015/diff/3001/chrome/chrome_browser.gypi
File chrome/chrome_browser.gypi (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12984015/diff/3001/chrome/chrome_browser.gypi#newcode2166
chrome/chrome_browser.gypi:2166: '../components/components.gyp:autofill_browser',
Jim can correct me, but I don't think this ought to be under OS != "ios".

https://codereview.chromium.org/12984015/diff/3001/components/navigation_interception.gypi
File components/navigation_interception.gypi (left):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12984015/diff/3001/components/navigation_interception.gypi#oldcode24
components/navigation_interception.gypi:24: 
nit: This doesn't seem related to the current CL; please fix this in a separate CL if you care to.

https://codereview.chromium.org/12984015/diff/3001/chrome/chrome_browser.gypi
File chrome/chrome_browser.gypi (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12984015/diff/3001/chrome/chrome_browser.gypi#newcode2166
chrome/chrome_browser.gypi:2166: '../components/components.gyp:autofill_browser',
see line 2200 below, I think most cc files are excluded.
Will wait for Jim's opinion

https://codereview.chromium.org/12984015/diff/3001/components/navigation_interception.gypi

https://codereview.chromium.org/12984015/diff/3001/components/navigation_interception.gypi#oldcode24

https://codereview.chromium.org/12984015/diff/3001/chrome/chrome_browser.gypi#newcode2166
chrome/chrome_browser.gypi:2166: '../components/components.gyp:autofill_browser',
On 2013/03/28 23:06:42, kaiwang wrote:
> see line 2200 below, I think most cc files are excluded.
> Will wait for Jim's opinion

Thanks.. it's complex with autofill because we're not using all of it. In this case we're not using anything under autofill/renderer so it should appear in this spot.
Chatted with Jim, this change could not patch in their branch but he'll help to merge. So I'll commit this.
